definitions: the position of protecting or defending something

examples.text: guardianship of traditional beliefs and standards
the guardianship of the rural landscape

shortDefinitions: position of protecting or defending something

definitions: the position of being legally responsible for the care of someone who is unable to manage their own affairs

examples.text: she was granted temporary guardianship of the three children
Peter was made the subject of a guardianship order

shortDefinitions: position of being legally responsible for care of someone who is unable to manage their own affairs
